<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Copy of GService Icon Link">f2c989d1db9c14505c116390149619e8</child><cloned>2020-04-16 17:41:26</cloned><last_validated>2020-04-16 17:41:26</last_validated><parent display_value="Image Link">86776e0453331300a699ddeeff7b12be</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[function() {
  /* widget controller */
  var c = this;
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.icon-img{position: absolute;&#13;
    right: 0;&#13;
    height: 75%;&#13;
	bottom:0&#13;
}&#13;
.image-link-header{&#13;
	font-size: 18px;&#13;
    margin: 5px 0;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
h2 {&#13;
  font-size: 18px;&#13;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description>Widget with image, title, description and link for information.</description><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>image-link</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Image Link</name><option_schema>[{"name":"image","section":"Presentation","label":"Image","type":"string"},{"name":"title","section":"Presentation","label":"Title","type":"string"},{"name":"description","section":"Presentation","label":"Description","type":"string"},{"name":"link","section":"Presentation","label":"Link","type":"string"},{"name":"link_title","section":"Presentation","label":"Link Title","type":"string"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles>admin,security_dashboard_user</roles><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  /* populate the 'data' object */
  /* e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table'); */

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-03 20:37:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>86776e0453331300a699ddeeff7b12be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>48</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Image Link</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Instance Security Center" source="com.glide.instance_sec_center">9c31bd4cdb350010fa11cf24149619c5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_86776e0453331300a699ddeeff7b12be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-12 22:31:04</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 mb-20 imagelink">
  <img src="{{c.options.image}}" class="icon-img" alt="{{c.options.title}}"/>
  <div class="col-lg-10 col-md-10 col-sm-10 col-xs-10">
  <div class="black image-link-header">
    <h2>{{c.options.title}}</h2>
  </div>
  <p>
    ${{{c.options.description}}}
  </p>
	<a href="{{c.options.link}}" target="_blank" class="btn btn-xs btn-primary" aria-label="{{c.options.description}} which opens in a new window">
      ${{{c.options.link_title}}}
    </a>
</div>
  </div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>organize.henrique</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-19 20:00:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>bac989d1db9c14505c116390149619ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>f2c989d1db9c14505c116390149619e8</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITSM Service Portal" source="x_gmeps_itsm_servi">334ae627dbc85c105c1163901496192f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITSM Service Portal">334ae627dbc85c105c1163901496192f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_bac989d1db9c14505c116390149619ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>organize.henrique</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-19 20:00:07</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
